body:
@tdfbsd,

Thanks. Well, which version of DragonFly BSD kernel are you running? We now observe the following test failure:
```
--- FAIL: TestGetfsstat (0.00s)
	syscall_bsd_test.go:31: an empty Statfs_t struct was returned
FAIL
```
I don't see the failure on 4.4.x, so I guess that it may be a side effect of hammer2 improvement work: http://lists.dragonflybsd.org/pipermail/commits/2016-June/541618.html.
